summary: Flexible ragdolls - Huge diference between vanilla ragdolls
descriptionHtml:
Flexible ragdolls for males and females, humans, elves and beasts. 

WARNING: If you use BBP (breast physics), this will result CTD (crash to desktop). If you don\'t use BBP then this is a mod for you.

Testers wanted - Please leave in the comments if the ragdolls are working properly, by that I mean no crashes, freezes or bugs. 

I will upload videos and pictures later on. Right now you can judge the ragdolls by trying them out by yourself.

-- Video ---

[youtube]PclzLQSi9fA[/youtube]

try this link if the video is private: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PclzLQSi9fA
author: DatBoiNC
